conversation_summary: A conversation asking and answering how old someone is.

conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: El parque abre a las diez de la mañana.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: Gracias, vendré allí a las nueve para hacer una carrera.

conversation_summary: A conversation about the opening time of the park and planning to go there for a run.

conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: Estaría aquí dentro de media hora.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: Gracias, me aseguraré de estar preparado para su llegada.

conversation_summary: A conversation about how long it will take for someone to arrive and being prepared for their arrival.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: ¿Qué tal si nosotros pagamos la cuenta?

conversation_summary: A conversation about offering to pay the bill and being grateful for the other person's generosity.

conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: Son las dos de la tarde.

conversation_summary: A conversation about what time it is and realizing how late it already is.
